Symbol.Script_1D:
MARKER_OBJECT_BASIC = 0 ! Basic Marker MARKER_OBJECT_SIMPLE = 1 ! Simple Marker
MARKER_TYPE_COMMON_SE_IE = 0 ! Section/Elevation Marker, Interior Elevation Marker MARKER_TYPE_SECTION = 1 ! Section Marker MARKER_TYPE_ELEVATION = 2 ! Elevation Marker MARKER_TYPE_INTERIOR_ELEVATION = 3 ! Interior Elevation Marker
if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 7 & GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 8 then call "LIMA_Section-Elevation Marker Macro" parameters all A = A, iMarkerObject = MARKER_OBJECT_SIMPLE, iMarkerType = MARKER_TYPE_SECTION endif
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! AC14 -> AC15 ! ==============================================================================
if actualGUID = "B7370147-187E-447C-83BE-4F96A07C9C91" then parameters gs_text_pos_mirr = 1 parameters gs_text2_pos_x = gs_text_pos_x parameters gs_text2_pos_y = gs_text_pos_y parameters gs_text2_pos_x_paper = gs_text_pos_x_paper parameters gs_text2_pos_y_paper = gs_text_pos_y_paper
actualGUID = "4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C" endif
! ============================================================================== ! New integer parameter AC15 -> AC16 ! ==============================================================================
_bTextRotationIsDefined = 0 if actualGUID = "4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C" then
call "Marker Link Parameters" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, iMarkerType = MARKER_TYPE_SECTION, bEnableDrawingID = 1, bEnableLayoutID = 1, returned_parameters returnedActID, GS_DrawingNoType_int, GS_SheetNoType_int
call "Section-Elevation Marker Macro" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, iMarkerObject = MARKER_OBJECT_SIMPLE, iMarkerType = MARKER_TYPE_SECTION, returned_parameters gs_marker_text_rotation_int
! needed in migration AC21 --> AC22 _gs_marker_text_rotation_int = gs_marker_text_rotation_int _bTextRotationIsDefined = 1
if returnedActID = 1 then actualGUID = "AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290" else actualGUID = "" endif endif
! ============================================================================== ! New Text parameters, new integer parameters for using values{2} command ! AC21 --> AC22 ! ==============================================================================
if actualGUID = "AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290" then ! There were fixed Alignments before bHasParameters = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("GS_Type70", _GS_Type70) if bHasParameters then if _GS_Type70 = 4 or _GS_Type70 = 6 then ! MARKER_CIRCLE1, MARKER_CIRCLE3 AC_TextAlignment_1 = 2 ! Center else AC_TextAlignment_1 = 3 ! Right endif parameters AC_TextAlignment_1 = AC_TextAlignment_1 endif
AC_TextLeading_1 = 1 parameters AC_TextLeading_1 = AC_TextLeading_1
if _bTextRotationIsDefined then ! No need to use DELETED_PAR_VALUE, it was used in the macro above (AC15 -> AC16) iTextRotation = _gs_marker_text_rotation_int parameters iTextRotation = iTextRotation else bHasParameters = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_marker_text_rotation_int", _gs_marker_text_rotation_int) if bHasParameters then iTextRotation = _gs_marker_text_rotation_int parameters iTextRotation = iTextRotation endif endif
bHasParameters = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("GS_UniTextFormat", _GS_UniTextFormat) if bHasParameters then if _GS_UniTextFormat then gs_OverrideTextFormat_1 = 0 gs_OverrideTextFormat_2 = 0 parameters gs_OverrideTextFormat_1 = gs_OverrideTextFormat_1, gs_OverrideTextFormat_2 = gs_OverrideTextFormat_2 else gs_OverrideTextFormat_1 = 1 gs_OverrideTextFormat_2 = 1 parameters gs_OverrideTextFormat_1 = gs_OverrideTextFormat_1, gs_OverrideTextFormat_2 = gs_OverrideTextFormat_2
bHasParameters1 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_font_pen", _gs_text_font_pen) bHasParameters2 = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("AC_TextPen_1", _AC_TextPen_1) if bHasParameters1 and bHasParameters2 then gs_TextPen_1 = _AC_TextPen_1 gs_TextPen_2 = _gs_text_font_pen parameters gs_TextPen_1 = gs_TextPen_1, gs_TextPen_2 = gs_TextPen_2 endif
bHasParameters1 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_font_type", _gs_text_font_type) bHasParameters2 = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("AC_TextFont_1", _AC_TextFont_1) if bHasParameters1 and bHasParameters2 then gs_TextFont_1 = _AC_TextFont_1 gs_TextFont_2 = _gs_text_font_type parameters gs_TextFont_1 = gs_TextFont_1, gs_TextFont_2 = gs_TextFont_2 endif
bHasParameters1 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_font_size", _gs_text_font_size) bHasParameters2 = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("AC_TextSize_1", _AC_TextSize_1) if bHasParameters1 and bHasParameters2 then gs_TextSize_1 = _AC_TextSize_1 gs_TextSize_2 = _gs_text_font_size parameters gs_TextSize_1 = gs_TextSize_1, gs_TextSize_2 = gs_TextSize_2 endif
bHasParameters1 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_style_bold", _gs_text_style_bold) bHasParameters2 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_style_italic", _gs_text_style_italic) bHasParameters3 = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_text_style_underline", _gs_text_style_underline) bHasParameters4 = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("AC_TextStyle_1", _AC_TextStyle_1)
if bHasParameters1 and bHasParameters2 and bHasParameters3 and bHasParameters4 then gs_TextStyle_1 = _AC_TextStyle_1 gs_TextStyle_2 = 1*_gs_text_style_bold + 2*_gs_text_style_italic + 4*_gs_text_style_underline parameters gs_TextStyle_1 = gs_TextStyle_1, gs_TextStyle_2 = gs_TextStyle_2 endif endif endif
actualGUID = "D7C54843-B69D-412B-A603-6AE1785764E0" endif
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
Symbol.Script_BWM:
bContinue = 1
! ============================================================================== ! AC22 --> AC21 ! new Integer parameters for using Values{2} command ! ============================================================================== if bContinue then ! from D7C54843-B69D-412B-A603-6AE1785764E0 to AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290
newparameter "gs_marker_text_rotation_int", "Integer" gs_marker_text_rotation_int = iTextRotation parameters gs_marker_text_rotation_int = gs_marker_text_rotation_int
newparameter "GS_UniTextFormat", "Boolean" if not(gs_OverrideTextFormat_1) and not(gs_OverrideTextFormat_2) then GS_UniTextFormat = 1 else GS_UniTextFormat = 0 endif parameters GS_UniTextFormat = GS_UniTextFormat
newparameter "gs_text_font_type", "String" gs_text_font_type = gs_TextFont_1 parameters gs_text_font_type = gs_text_font_type
newparameter "gs_text_font_size", "RealNum" gs_text_font_size = gs_TextSize_1 parameters gs_text_font_size = gs_text_font_size
newparameter "gs_text_style_bold", "Boolean" if gs_TextStyle_1 = 1 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 3 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 5 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 7 then gs_text_style_bold = 1 else gs_text_style_bold = 0 endif parameters gs_text_style_bold = gs_text_style_bold
newparameter "gs_text_style_italic", "Boolean" if gs_TextStyle_1 = 2 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 3 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 6 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 7 then gs_text_style_italic = 1 else gs_text_style_italic = 0 endif parameters gs_text_style_italic = gs_text_style_italic
newparameter "gs_text_style_underline", "Boolean" if gs_TextStyle_1 = 4 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 5 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 6 or gs_TextStyle_1 = 7 then gs_text_style_underline = 1 else gs_text_style_underline = 0 endif parameters gs_text_style_underline = gs_text_style_underline
newparameter "gs_text_font_pen", "PenColor" gs_text_font_pen = gs_TextPen_1 parameters gs_text_font_pen = gs_text_font_pen
targetGUID = "AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290" if TO_GUID = "AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290" then bContinue = 0 endif
! ============================================================================== ! New integer parameter AC16 -> AC15 ! ==============================================================================
if bContinue then ! from AC42605D-2F0F-4890-BFE1-8D82146B9290 to 4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C
targetGUID = "4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C" if TO_GUID = "4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C" then bContinue = 0 endif
! ============================================================================== ! AC15 --> AC14 ! ==============================================================================
if bContinue then ! from 4BD0AC6F-B428-41B7-94CE-EE4D06592A3C to B7370147-187E-447C-83BE-4F96A07C9C91
targetGUID = "B7370147-187E-447C-83BE-4F96A07C9C91" if TO_GUID = "B7370147-187E-447C-83BE-4F96A07C9C91" then bContinue = 0 endif
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
